mean_cn: n. 咒骂语；  adj. 感叹的，附加的，填补的
mean_en: a word or phrase (such as “Damn it!”) that people sometimes say when they are angry or in pain
word_etyma: ex 出去+ plet 满，填满 + ive 形容词后缀 →在外面等着填满 →附加的
sentence: Please don't use that expletive - no bad language in my company.
sentence_trans: 请不要说那句咒骂语，我的公司禁止脏话。
